pageProduct.name: OGX Renewing Moroccan Argan Oil Conditioner 88.7ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OGX Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner is a sulfate free shampoo that penetrates the hair shaft, reviving dry damaged hair. This argan oil conditioner is hydrating and moisturising for soft, strong hair.

OGX Renewing+ Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner.
Why You Want It... This exotic, hydrating argan oil conditioner helps to penetrate, moisturise, revive and create softness and strength while helping to protect your hair from harmful styling heat and UV damage. Discover smooth, sexy tresses.

A unique, precious blend with argan oil of Morocco helps to penetrate the hair shaft. Discover newly restored strength, shine, softness, and seductive, silky perfection.


Moisturising conditioner with Argan oil for dry damaged hair

Use for shiny, smooth hair that is stronger

Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

Not tested on animals

Size: 88.7mL

Shelf Life in Days: 3 years

KEY FEATURES

• Travel Size 88.7mL

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately. In case of any discomfort, please discontinue and consult a physician. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol. Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Steareth 20, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Amodimethicone, Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Polyquaternium-47, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid. Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, CI 19140 (Yellow 5), and CI 14700 (FD&C Red No.4).

Directions

What You Do... After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair, working through to ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly.

USAGE ADVICE

For best results, use in conjunction with other OGX products.
